00023 namespace McMd

00026    using namespace Util;

00028    /* 
00029    * Constructor.
00030    */
00031    McExternalEnergyAverage::McExternalEnergyAverage(McSystem& system)
00032     : SystemDiagnostic<McSystem>(system),
00033       outputFile_(),
00034       accumulator_(),
00035       nSamplePerBlock_(1),
00036       isInitialized_(false)
00037    {}
00038 
00039    /*
00040    * Read parameters and initialize.
00041    */
00042    void McExternalEnergyAverage::readParam(std::istream& in)
00043    {
00044 
00045       readInterval(in);
00046       readOutputFileName(in);
00047       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00048 
00049       accumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00050 
00051       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00052       if (nSamplePerBlock_) {
00053          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00054       }
00055 
00056       isInitialized_ = true;
00057    }
00058 
00059    /*
00060    * Clear accumulator.
00061    */
00062    void McExternalEnergyAverage::setup() 
00063    {  accumulator_.clear(); }
00064  
00065    /*
00066    * Evaluate energy per particle, and add to ensemble. 
00067    */
00068    void McExternalEnergyAverage::sample(long iStep) 
00069    {
00070 
00071       if (!isAtInterval(iStep)) return;
00072 
00073       double energy;
00074       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00075       Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00076 
00077       energy = 0.0;
00078 
00079       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < system().simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec){
00080            for (system().begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter){
00081                 for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00082                     energy += system().externalPotential().energy(atomIter->position(), atomIter->typeId());
00083 
00084                 }
00085            }
00086       }
00087 
00088       accumulator_.sample(energy, outputFile_);
00089    }
00090 
00091    /*
00092    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00093    */
00094    void McExternalEnergyAverage::output() 
00095    { 
00096       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00097       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00098          outputFile_.close();
00099       }
00100 
00101       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00102       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00103       outputFile_.close();
00104 
00105       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00106       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00107       outputFile_.close();
00108 
00109    }
00110    
00111    /*
00112    * Save state to binary file archive.
00113    */
00114    void McExternalEnergyAverage::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00115    { ar & *this; }
00116 
00117    /*
00118    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00119    */
00120    void McExternalEnergyAverage::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00121    { ar & *this; }
00122 
00123 }
